conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a successful 3D extrusions of the 2D floor plan with clear wall verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent extrusion and volume; viewing angle is slightly high (near orthographic) but depth is still clearly visible.

geometric_accuracy.notes: All rooms, partitions, and balconies are accounted for with high fidelity to the source layout.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement, including kitchen island and bathroom fixtures, is highly accurate.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good materials; lighting is flat but provides high visibility.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings are simplified as generic white blocks rather than transparent or cutout gaps.

summary: An exceptionally geometrically faithful 3D conversion that captures all rooms and furniture placements with high precision.
